sunlight-sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
sunlight-sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the ${name} has disadvantage on Attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight

pack-tactics.name: Pack Tactics
pack-tactics.description: The ${name} has advantage on an Attack roll against a creature if at least one of the $(name)'s allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't Incapacitated.
